works.description:
These websites had copied my content indiscriminately. Our copyrighted work had been violated and we would like to take action against them.

In some cases, images and content were blatantly copied. Proof? Look at the images (Right click the source code and most of the time our website domain had been copied in it. The alt text used in the images are also the same in most cases.)

In some scenarios, they had also used a language translator to change the language but the images and link urls could still be seen. More often, it is just a blatant copy and paste of the content from our site.
